ovdesc.p: Used to initiate the automatic matching process. May be run for either a selected depository, group of depositories or all depositories.

desc.p: If a depository is selected in the DEPOSITORY field then this field CANNOT be YES. To automatch all accounts in the SR.HOLDINGS file select YES in the ALL.ACCOUNTS field. This will then update the SR.HOLDINGS records on verify.
Either YES, NO or blank. Entering YES will run automatic matching for all depositories
The list of depositories for whom the automatic matching process is to be run.
Must have a CUSTOMER.TYPE of DEPOSITORY in the CUSTOMER.SECURITY application.
May not be used if ALL.DEPOSITORIES is selected.
The key to the record, can be any value upto 15 characters as defined in the STANDARD.A table.
